aabraham eeshrayel wanshaye pathriyak hewath mulika piya lesa salake.aabrahamwa nawa wanshayak bihi karanu sandaha dewindun wisin kandawanu labiya.ohuge nama pawa ‘eeshrayel’ lesa dewindun wisin wenas karanu labiya.ohuwa kandawanu labuwe anya jathinta ( eeshrayel nowana ) dewalokaya pathirawimatath dewa janathawak prathisthapanaya karanu sandahathya.

ape karyalayata aluthin kenek aawahama api ee pudgalaya diha balanne ee pudgalaya gana kagen hari ahala thiyena widihatane neda?kawuruhari naraka aaranchiyak kiyala thibboth api mulinma balanneth eewidihatayi.thamanta nogalapena anshayaka wada karapu nisama akaryakshama wuna pudgalayek api inna anshayakata aawoth api kathawenne “kisi wadakata nathi ekek aluthin awith inne” kiyalane ee manussaya dakinnath kalin.eewagema thamayi honda warnanawak ekka aawoth api hithan inne hari ihalin.eeka thamayi manushya swabhawaya.api nodanuwathwama api adahas nayata aran neda?

owun ee thakshanaya me lokayata handunwa dimath samagama loka prasiddha wenawa ,melowa chithrapata karmanthaya udu yatikuru wenawa , owun ehi janapriya tharu bawata pathwenawa , owunwa aapahu ragena yanna owunge loken enne na , samaharawita owun rahas elikara athiyi kiyana sakaya nisa wenna puluwan , kalaya gatha wenawa me kandayame siti hathara denagen kena bagin miyayanawa ,kandayame pradhaniyage hondama hithawatha wu kamara shilpiyath miyagiya pasu awasanaye ithiriwanne owunge pradhaniya pamanayi , namuth hitiwanama ohuth athurudahan wenawa , inpasu ohuwa katawath dakinnata labenne na ."

puhunu shramikayan 1039 k wasarakata rate shrama balakayata ekkarana weyangoda pihiti gampaha disthrik wruththiya puhunu madhyasthanaya disthrikkaya thula pihiti pradeshiya puhunu madhyasthana 13ka poshaka madhyasthanayada weyi.mehi puhunuwa awasan karana tharuna tharuniyan rakiya gatha wime prathishathaya 95 % ikmawana bawa shri lanka wruththiya puhunu adhikariye gampaha disthrik sahakara adhyaksha ech. pi. manamperi mahatha pawasayi.‘jiwithayata hakiyawak – hakiyawata rakiyawak’ themawa anuwa illumak pawathna keshthrayanhi shilpiya nipunathawaya labima rakiyagatha wima athin mewan pragathiyak athiwimata hethukaraka wi athayida adhyaksha manamperi mahatha pawasayi.pariganaka diploma, widuli karmika, ilektronik thakshanaya, widuli shilpi, shithakarana, wayu samikarana, thorathuru thakshana, pariganaka paddhathi nirmanaya saha wadasatahana sampadanaya diplomawa, adhiwegi mahana mashin karmika / kriyakaru motar karmika pedareru jala nala, riyaduru, adum masima, rupalawanya, yathurupadi, thriroda ratha karmika athuluwa patamala 46 k danata me disthrik madhyasthana jalaya thula kriyathmaka kare.wisheshitha wu patamala kipayak sandaha masika dimana, sahanadayi milakata langama wara prawesha pathra wruththiya ingirisi danuma wyasayakathwa danuma kuda ha madhyama parimana wyapara aarambha kirimata upades ha naya pahasukam sapayima ihala watup sahitha deshiya ho wideshiya rakiya sandahayomu kirima puhunu wannanta salasana wenath pahasukam athara weyi..
